tool_description: Get the clustered analytical data from your users feedback using advanced NLP and text analysis. Get names of people, numbers, emoticons, emojis, places and organizations from your feedback data. Convenient APIs to help you analyze your users' feedback.
name: Feedback Analysis API
title: Feedback Analysis API

api_list.name: Feedback People
api_list.description: Extracts people names from feedback or text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Hands down the best chicken wings I have ever eaten. My partner, Sally, and I were visiting some friends in the area and these heavenly wings (and a couple of sides of rice) were the only thing requested. The wings themselves had great flavor and AMAZING crunch. But really, I think the crispiness of the wings is what makes the wings so good (and addicting). The sauce was a balanced mix of sweet and spicy (very mild, if I had to rate it), which was also great over rice.

api_list.name: Feedback Places
api_list.description: Extracts places from feedback or text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: I came from Italy as per a job travel and our team needed to decide which restaurtant to go to for lunch. Yours was suggested and boy did we love it! The creamy pasta was fabulous as were the meat balls. If I could suggest one thing, please keep the feta cheese on the side for the pizza because some of us liked it without the extra cheese. The atmosphere was great and the music was good too. When are you opening up a franchise in Italy? Put me on your email list please.

api_list.name: Feedback Organizations
api_list.description: Extract organization names from feedback or text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: I came from Italy as per a job travel and our team at Dunder Miflin needed to decide which restaurtant to go to for lunch. Yours was suggested and boy did we love it! The creamy pasta was fabulous as were the meat balls. If I could suggest one thing, please keep the feta cheese on the side for the pizza because some of us liked it without the extra cheese. The atmosphere was great and the music was good too. When are you opening up a franchise in Italy? Put me on your email list please.

api_list.name: Feedback Emoticons
api_list.description: Extract emoticons from feedback or text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: I was very happy to see you. Thank you so much :)

api_list.name: Feedback Clusters
api_list.description:
Using advanced NLP to gain insights into user feedback using clustering. There are feedback highlights that represent the highlight of the text so you don't have to look for the best parts. There subject matters to help classify, sentiment to get the mood and the postive/negative word counts.

This will help breakdown all the feedback and allow you to gain a better understanding of your customers' feedback.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Hands down the best chicken wings I have ever eaten. My partner and I were visiting some friends in the area and these heavenly wings (and a couple of sides of rice) were the only thing requested. The wings themselves had great flavor and AMAZING crunch. But really, I think the crispiness of the wings is what makes the wings so good (and addicting). The sauce was a balanced mix of sweet and spicy (very mild, if I had to rate it), which was also great over rice.

api_list.name: Feedback Numbers
api_list.description: Extract written numbers from feedback and text, i.e. "Ten" or "Eighty one"

api_list.name: Feedback Emojis
api_list.description: Extract emojis from feedback or text
